bugprone-posix-return.description:
Description

Checks if any calls to
pthread_*
or
posix_*
functions
(except
posix_openpt
) expect negative return values. These functions return
either
0
on success or an
errno
on failure, which is positive only.

Example buggy usage looks like:

if
(
posix_fadvise
(...)
<
0
)
{

This will never happen as the return value is always non-negative.
A simple fix could be:

if
(
posix_fadvise
(...)
>
0
)
{
